raw_text:
Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 DISPLAY OPERATION Pro Line Fusion® Avionics DU Window Allocation

• A readout is used to show information that the operator may not edit. Readouts usually have a legend, a unit of measurement, and the data readout.

• A status bar indicates the real-time progress towards completion of an activity, for example, software loading.

• A subformat link is used to access a subformat when selected.
